title: Power Analysis: The Giro d’Italia’s Queen Stage Split the Race Wide Open
content:
We dig into the incredible power file from Derek Gee in the Giro's queen stage: If it wasn’t for a disastrous start in Albania, the Canadian would be a half-minute to the 'maglia rosa.'

Read the full article at Power Analysis: The Giro d’Italia’s Queen Stage Split the Race Wide Open on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
